## Config.VirtualPathRules property

Defines path transformations that are used for overriding files. Later rules result in a higher preference. Duplicate matcher paths will end up being ignored. All paths should be relative, or undefined behaviour may occur.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
VirtualPathRules?: [string, string][];
```
